abstract.p: Defense Department confirms deaths of eight American service members in Iraq, bringing total to 3,313 (S)

block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 3,313 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:
BISHOP, Jeffery A., 23, Lance Cpl., Marines; Dickson, Tenn.; Second Marine Division.
BUSHNELL, William W., 24, Sgt., Army; Jasper, Ark.; First Cavalry Division.
HARPER, Marlon B., 34, Staff Sgt., Army; Baltimore; First Cavalry Division.
MOORE, Dwayne L., 31, Chief Warrant Officer, Army; Williamsburg, Va.; 10th Mountain Division.
NORTH, Christopher M., 21, Pfc., Army; Sarasota, Fla.; First Infantry Division.
OGLESBY, Wade J., 27, Cpl., Army; Grand Junction, Colo.; Second Infantry Division.
ROJAS, Michael M., 21, Cpl., Army; Fresno, Calif.; Second Infantry Division.
SLATER, Michael J., 19, Pvt., Army; Scott Depot, W. Va.; 82nd Airborne Division.
The Department of Defense has identified 3,313 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:
BISHOP, Jeffery A., 23, Lance Cpl., Marines; Dickson, Tenn.; Second Marine Division.
